description: The GVK Lounge, by TFS Performa, located at Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport in Mumbai, India, is the world's best first class airport lounge.
title: The best first class lounge in the world
title_page: The best first class lounge in the world - Business Insider
text:
The GVK Lounge bars stock everything from fine wines and Champagnes to rum punch. GVK One of the most appealing aspects of first class travel is the exclusive airport lounge that usually precedes a flight.
But not all lounges are created equal. The GVK Lounge by TFS Performa was voted World's Leading First Class Airport Lounge in the World Travel Awards 2016.
Located at Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport in Mumbai, India, the GVK Lounge also took the title in 2015 — and it's easy to see why.
While the first class area is the one that took the accolade thanks to its fantastic à la carte dining, spa treatments, and relaxation rooms, the Business Premium Lounge is just as luxurious for those willing to spend on a Business Class flight.
Take a look inside the opulent GVK Lounge below.
